name: The Last Man
nutshell:
A mysterious boy lies naked and unconscious on the street. The story begins when ninth grader, Ai Oomori, and his third grader brother, Seigi, find him. This boy has no memory of the past and doesn't even know his real name. He is like a little baby. Ai names this boy Makoto and takes him back home. Makoto has superhuman physical powers and can even recover quickly from injuries. Who is Makoto? Makoto is easygoing and not at all bothered by everyone's curiosity. Until that is he is pursued by a cruel woman who disguises herself as a spider. A neo sapiens, this spider woman has been dispatched by a mystery organization called, "Love & Peace." Her mission is to bring back Makoto dead or alive.
Source: MU

name: Hasla
nutshell: In the city of Hasla, if you save 7 lives, you're allowed to murder one person. DoJin dreams of the perfect revenge… by becoming a "Samaritan" in Hasla, the city of blood.

name: Era of the Eldest Son
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Hayato Kuno, a man who chose to become a hitman to support his family as the eldest son after his father committed suicide. In a world like this, the only people who can believe in each other are family members, and it is the eldest son who must endure, never dreaming!
What is reflected in Hayato's eyes as he faithfully carries out his orders and lives only in the present reality...?
A violent action manga with soul!

name: Genshi
nutshell:
A girl suddenly shows signs of phantom limb syndrome - an ailment that allows her to transform her hand into a tool - and is sent for safekeeping in the country of children due to the risk it poses.
Sunday Webry rookie award free division consolation prize winner, November 2021.

name: Domoto Rule
nutshell: A 21 year old guy named Hamadayama Kouzou struggles to live alone in Tokyo after running away from home, he meets a man named Domoto Kanji and his life changes drastically.

name: Boku to Akumu to Oneesan
nutshell: When a mysterious boy who always holds a black book in his hands sleeps he dreams grotesque things.

name: Kugiko-chan
nutshell:
The story revolves around the fear of Kugiko-san, an urban legend spread among children. According to rumors, people who have encountered Kugiko-san have had nails (kugi) driven into their eyes. A solitary male shoujo manga creator named "P" follows the truth behind the urban legend.
Kugiko-san (クギ子さん) - parent story that Kugiko-chan was based off; included at the end of each volume:

Volume 1: Fan Letter (ファンレター; 2 chapters) Nakayoshi, Sep-Oct 2011
Volume 2: Kugiko-san Jouhou - First Part (クギ子さん情報)
Volume 3: Kugiko-san Jouhou - Last Part

name: Virgin Star
nutshell:
Breakout actor, Izumi Hayato, is charismatic and energetic in front of the camera but once the cameras are off Izumi becomes an expressionless antisocial person. Because of his introverted personality, Izumi's manager, Miyano Souta always has a hard time dealing with him.
Unbeknownst to others, Izumi's icy personality isn't intentional. And despite his cold personality, costar Saotome Hijiri still attempts to get close to Izumi. Soon, the cheerful Saotome's personality starts to have an effect on Izumi, but not one that he expects or one Saotome's manager wants. Can Izumi overcome his ineptness in communicating long enough to express his love to Saotome and win Saotome's heart?

name: Once Again, I'd Like to Love You
nutshell: A high school girl runs into her ex-boyfriend at a train station and the two reconnect.

name: Dekichatta Shitsuji
nutshell: Konno Wataru, an only son who is rich, studious, and quite prideful, has a "butler". In charge of him is the perverted, domineering sadist Azuma, holding an official caretaker license. Amidst their instinctual cat-dog relationship, things get a bit risqué.

name: Beastars - Beast Complex (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Prototype version of Beastars. This follows the story of an adult version of Legoshi and Haru.

name: Touhou - Chiyorozu Restaurant (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Akyu chronicles her wacky exploits in a picture diary.

name: "The Wandering Senior" Don Quixote
nutshell: Inspired by Cervantes' Don Quixote, the author criticizes heartless individualism and indifference in modern Japan, as seen through the eyes of an old man, who, although childish with age, sees the truth of things.

name: Together With Woo Rae
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,School Life,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: Rae rejects an invitation to go to a semester-end party from the most popular student on campus, Sungwoon, But what happens when Rae's new part-time job is at a strange bunny boy costume bar… and his customer is a drunk Sungwoon?!

name: Futari no Tokubetsu Jugyou
nutshell: Udagawa is scared of being hated by people, and acts a lot brighter than he is. One day, he is paired with the unsociable Watabe for an assignment, and is told “I hate people like you” when he tries to talk to him. After receiving such a shock, he gradually starts speaking more frankly to Watabe and finds himself feeling comfortable around him. Wanting to be liked by him, Udagawa tells him his true feelings. Before he knew it, Watabe had turned into a precious “true friend” to him…

name: Kareshi no Neko ga Kawaikunai!
nutshell: The start of a lovey dovey life together! Or it should've been, but Matsuri's now living together with her boyfriend's beloved cat Sayuri…!? The struggle for her boyfriend with her cat-in-law begins!

name: Cold - Zettaireido no Koibitotachi
nutshell: Odagiri Yuki, a brilliant surgeon, is also known as the "Absolute Zero Angel" for his ice-cold aloofness with people, and his soulful compassion when he operates on patients. Haunted by a lover's death, Yuki consoles himself with drugs and sex… This piques both personal and professional interests in Mine, a neuropsychologist, who accepted Kuneida's request to cure his friend's coldness. What would it take to melt the "Absolute Zero Angel"?

name: Dog Meets Baby Cats
nutshell: A dog finds two kittens.

name: Don't Look Back, Seisia!
nutshell:
Seisia Lidyne is on the run. After her stepmother scolded her once more, it was the last straw for Seisia. With just enough money to take a carriage to a nearby village, she escapes from Lidyne Estate. The villagers remain wary at first at the sight of a stranger. Seisia also fumbles as she enters the world of commoners for the first time. Due to a fortunate turn of events, she manages to hide her identity and settle in the village as its healer. She starts her new life as Sha, the village healer. Although some of the villagers remain abrasive towards her, she's still glad that Lidyne Estate is now behind her. Unbeknownst to the villagers and her own family, Seisia possesses healing powers. She comes from a lineage of dark magicians and as a result, she was the black sheep of Lidyne Estate. Her powers remain hidden until she discovers a wounded man one day. She has no choice but to use her powers to heal him. After he's healed he introduces himself as Dian and Seisia speculates that he comes from nobility based on his uniform and knowledge of medicinal herbs. He decides to extend his stay in the village while Seisia's curiosity about him continues to grow. When a villager shares a story about a promiscuous young noblewoman who strongly resembles Sha in the description, she decides that it's time to move on to the next village.
Official English version

name: Yama no Susume - Clash-House Summer Style (Doujinshi)
Shingeki no Kyojin - Back Alley Cat (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Erwin x Levi

name: Papa's Assassin
nutshell:
An assassin is retiring after he finishes dodging bullets from his current assignment, all while fantasizing about his future leisurely life, when a strange woman throws a little boy down to him and begs him to, "Save this child!" 14 years later, instead of managing a fancy art gallery he's doing manual labor and raising an increasingly distant teenage boy but he's happy to provide a happy home for his new son until he realizes why Ryuunosuke has been acting so strangely….
Note: Chapter 13 isn't missing, the gap in numbering comes from some inconsistency in how the chapters were numbered before. Source

name: The Arrogant Man's Secretary
nutshell:
Da-young Yoon is an elite in the secretarial world, has a smart job, and has a beautiful appearance. Perfection at work, with a thorough separation between public and private lives... Perfect in every aspect, she is forced to change her job due to her boss's scandal. That night. On the way home after part-time work, Da-yong, who is in trouble due to a drunken person, meets a man and who helps her. But that's not all, there are unexpected hugs, nosebleeds, and even kisses!
"Thank you, Boeun."
"Yeah?"
"Lips, nosebleeds, lifesavers. Isn't it something that can't be overlooked?"
Dayoung hands her flyer to a man who insists on her reward, saying it is her own business card, and she runs away. The man is her new boss, the president of the Koryo Hotel. Without even dreaming that it was Kang Do Hoon.
"Ah~ Was this the place you moved to? Not a knight"... Ruined. Is the dismissal confirmed from the first day? A sweet and bloody male romance between Da-young Yoon, and Kang Do-hoon, an arrogant man!

name: Stravaganza ~ Isai no Hime ~
nutshell:
A mysterious warrior travels the kingdom of Auroria, battling monstrous creatures and seeking adventure. Few know she is secretly Auroria’s young and inexperienced masked monarch -- Queen Vivian. In a world where humans are not at the top of the food chain, the Queen in the Iron Mask must learn to use both her sword and her throne to protect her people from the dangers looming just beyond the city walls.
---Note on official english translation by Udon:- It combines 2 Japanese volumes into 1, producing total 3 volumes from 6.- Volume 7 is a compilation of 8 short stories and was not included.

name: Usagi no Koi
nutshell: The one whom the coward me loves is the cool but kind Shinobu-kun, I want to say "I Love You" one day. Will my wish… come true….?

name: Renai Virgin
nutshell: Collection of short love stories for mature audiences, containts explict content!

name: Arakure Knight: Koukou Bakusouhen
nutshell: The sequel of Arakure Knight

name: Ringo ni Hachimitsu
nutshell: Natsuki sees the world through a lonely haze. So, why is strange and popular Komano suddenly circling him with a sly smile? Is his attention a cruel joke…or is something delicious bubbling just beneath the surface?
